Project Budget FAQ

What does a typical MVP cost?
Most minimum‑viable products we build fall between $15 k – $40 k, depending on scope and platform (iOS, Android, Web, or cross‑platform).

How are payments structured?
We typically work on a time‑and‑materials basis with a weekly cap — you’re invoiced every week and can pause or adjust scope at any milestone review.

Need something smaller?
Prototype engagements start around $5 k. Tell us your goals and we’ll recommend the most cost‑effective path.
